gameWaitBeforeQuestionsCopy.description: Answer all six questions (no stopping for wrong answers) as fast as you can. 10 seconds per question. Speed and accuracy win. Here comes the first question.
gameWaitBeforeQuestionsCopy.title: Let's Play!

leaderboardCopy.description: Congrats on seeing your name in lights. Don't let someone steal your thunder. Play again to maintain your spot.

postgameResultsCopy.description: Thanks for playing! See you again next week.

pregameRotatingCopy.-LDrOVz5N4PlxTiRRg4_: This prize isn’t going to win itself.
pregameRotatingCopy.-LDrOXqv8GbBfTNbojz3: Tip: Play as many games as you can. Scores are accumulated. Plus, we like you.
pregameRotatingCopy.-LDrOZCILfoMJHAgeRBZ: You’ve gotta ask yourself one question: “Do I feel lucky?”
pregameRotatingCopy.-LDrO_WBpXRnWO4Cuny3: Tip: Try not to use all 10 seconds answering a question. Speed matters.
pregameRotatingCopy.-LDrOb-udJuTjbd6D2dx: Win or lose, at least we'll have shared this moment together.
pregameRotatingCopy.-LDrOctx12XGHvAspYac: Warm up those thumbs and get ready to win some prizes.
pregameRotatingCopy.-LDrOeIiZDpMZcgxe82T: Your high school teachers are about to either be very proud or very disappointed.
pregameRotatingCopy.-LDrOfjD29eAMSHKgd4f: Tip: Answer every question, even if you get one wrong. We’re all about forgiveness.
pregameRotatingCopy.-LDrOjHSlTHoQp2tRYrD: There are no participation ribbons in trivia.

registrationCopy.disclosure: By filling out this form, you are opting in to receiving notifications regarding DEG Trivia via email and SMS, as well as general follow-up communications from the agency. Learn more about DEG’s privacy policy.
registrationCopy.title: Welcome to DEG Trivia!

gameWaitBeforeQuestionsCopy.description: Answer all six questions (no stopping for wrong answers) as fast as you can. 10 seconds per question. Speed and accuracy win. Here comes the first question.
gameWaitBeforeQuestionsCopy.title: Let's Play!

leaderboardCopy.description: Thanks for playing Connections Trivia. If you see your name in lights, congrats! If you don’t, remember, it’s all about having fun anyway.

postgameResultsCopy.description: Eager for more knowledge? Stop by booth #303 to learn how to make the most of your marketing program.

pregameRotatingCopy.-LDrNuHhq0tUD7TWilzW: Tip: Stop by DEG’s booth #303 while you wait. You never know when an answer could be hiding in plain sight.
pregameRotatingCopy.-LDrO-JvIbdoE377ZJPr: This prize isn’t going to win itself.
pregameRotatingCopy.-LDrO1RsFIJGm8SsaWxb: Tip: Play as many games as you can. Scores are accumulated. Plus, we like you.
pregameRotatingCopy.-LDrO3Lxt0Q9KgElg7iX: You’ve gotta ask yourself one question: “Do I feel lucky?”
pregameRotatingCopy.-LDrO4YkyXn3r4T8t7EJ: Tip: Try not to use all 10 seconds answering a question. Speed matters.
pregameRotatingCopy.-LDrO73iedMz3jMNATia: Win or lose, at least we'll have shared this moment together.
pregameRotatingCopy.-LDrO9kjeGnJ3npSv0OR: Warm up those thumbs and get ready to win some prizes.
pregameRotatingCopy.-LDrOBQ2uvwl0Tp7xPbI: Your high school teachers are about to either be very proud or very disappointed.
pregameRotatingCopy.-LDrODM6s4dLH_XnzlS7: Tip: Answer every question, even if you get one wrong. We’re all about forgiveness.
pregameRotatingCopy.-LDrOGfpKFatEDdhPR4E: Tip: Do you know what city you’re in? That’s a good start.
pregameRotatingCopy.-LDrOI_JMZ0BiVMNrpES: There are no participation ribbons in trivia.

registrationCopy.disclosure: By filling out this form, you are opting in to receiving notifications regarding Connections trivia via email and SMS, as well as general follow-up communications from the agency. Learn more about DEG’s privacy policy.
registrationCopy.title: Welcome to Connections Trivia, presented by DEG.

tvCopy.message1: DEG is a full service marketing agency here to help you.
tvCopy.message2: Let us help you market to the moment.
